content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generation system at x=-25.0 y=80.5
(No changes from previous report)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at x=-20.5 y=69.5 (connection issues)
- Boiler at x=-25.0 y=80.5 (fuel: 22 coal)
- Steam engine at x=-25.5 y=89.5 (reappeared but not connected)
- Pipe networks with connection issues

### New electricity generation system at x=-6.0 y=-0.5
(No changes from previous report)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at x=-9.5 y=-0.5 (connection issues)
- Offshore pump at x=-9.5 y=2.5 (connection issues)
- Boiler at x=-8.0 y=0.5 (fuel: 4 coal)
- Boiler at x=-6.0 y=-0.5 (fuel: 20 coal)
- Partial pipe connections at x=-9.5 y=0.5 (water connection incomplete)
- Missing steam engine (placement still failing)

### Copper mining operation at x=-55.5 y=70.5
(No changes from previous report)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at x=-55.5 y=70.5 (no power)
- Burner inserter at x=-55.5 y=72.5 (fuel: 9 coal)
- Stone furnace at x=-55.0 y=75.0 (fuel: 10 coal)
- Wooden chest at x=-55.5 y=76.5 (empty)

### Expanded iron mining operation at x=15.5 y=70.5
(Updated from previous report)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at x=16.0 y=71.0 (fuel: 16 coal, working, producing iron ore)
- Transport belt at x=16.5 y=72.5 (connected to drill)
- Belt group with 3 belts (transporting iron ore)
- Wooden chest at x=16.5 y=75.5 (empty)
- Missing furnace (previously at x=16.0 y=74.0 was removed)

## ERROR TIPS

### Entity placement and verification
- Verify target positions are clear before placement (repeated burner inserter placement failures at x=16.5 y=74.5)
- Implement position validation before transport belt placement (failed to place belt at x=16.5 y=73.5)
- Verify entity existence before interaction (multiple failures to get stone furnace at x=16.0 y=74.0)

### Production chain setup
- Maintain stable production chain components (furnace disappeared from iron mining operation)
- Implement proper entity tracking (lost track of furnace position)
- Verify transport belt connections (belt group shows only partial connection)

### Resource management
- Monitor fuel levels closely (coal inventory fluctuating between 1-9)
- Clear blocked outputs promptly (multiple drill output clearing operations)
- Track production outputs (iron ore production reached 15 units)

### System verification
- Implement comprehensive pre-operation checks (multiple consecutive placement failures)
- Verify entity persistence (furnace disappeared without replacement)
- Monitor production chain integrity (missing furnace breaks iron plate production)
